name: A Good Life: Simulator
description:
In A Good Life, you can start a life and choose your own path. Good or bad, you decide! More than once in our lifetime, we sometimes wonder what will happen if we choose a different path, a different way of life. This rings true to you? No worries! In A Good Life, you can choose whatever you wish to achieve. Unlock and see various life destinies in the game and enjoy the thrilling, roller-coaster ride of life!

Your choice does matter! It will bring you to the unpredictable scenario that will make your life better... or even worse along the way. Make sure you always make the best life decision in order to live a good life for as long as you can. Every choice you make will lead you to the consequences that will affect your happiness, charm, wealth, and kindness. Explore all the surprising life scenarios to unlock all the destiny of a life that's been written in the stars (and the game).

Craving for a dilemmatic story like drama, romance, comedy, and mystery? Create and find your own life story and destiny as they're all in your hand and only one tap away!

Are you ready to live a Good Life?

Got a story to tell? We're here to listen! Contact us via info@alegrium.com.
